identity.name: Kuro
identity.description: A premium, minimalist file storage platform that treats data like art.
identity.tone: Swiss Brutalist meets Digital Vault. Objective, rigid, functional, yet emotionally heavy.
identity.archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast (Authority, Clarity, Truth) with Electric Accents

headings.usage: Use for all major headings (h1-h3). Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all UI text, labels, and paragraphs.

mono.usage: Use for file metadata, IDs, and technical details.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid var(--border). No rounded corners on main containers (0px). Small elements use rounded-md.
visual_enhancers.shadows: None for cards. Sharp offsets for floating elements: shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used sparingly on sticky headers: backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b border-border/50.

buttons.default: h-10 px-6 rounded-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-transform active:translate-y-0.5

cards.style: bg-card border border-border rounded-none p-6 hover:border-primary transition-colors duration-300
cards.interaction: No lift. Border color change only.

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-none border-2 border-input bg-transparent px-4 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 transition-colors

motion.hover: scale-[1.02] for images, color shift for text

auth_background.description: Abstract 3D code monitor for login/signup side panel

dashboard_empty.description: Minimalist monitor for empty state or 'no files' view

collaboration_hero.description: Casual workspace for 'Shared with me' or team section

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Syne' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Manrope' for body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
Ensure the Dark/Light toggle works and persists preference.
Use the specified color palette. Do not use default Tailwind colors.
For the Dashboard, use a Sidebar layout with a Bento Grid for the main content.
File cards should be rectangular with sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm).
Use the 'auth_background' image for the login page split layout.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors with subtle noise if possible.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with spacing and typography.
No gradients for text or buttons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
